blueprint.description: Installs diff-so-fancy (a better version of git diff) on Linux and macOS
blueprint.overview: [diff-so-fancy](https://github.com/so-fancy/diff-so-fancy) strives to make your diffs human readable instead of machine readable. This helps improve code quality and helps you spot defects faster.
blueprint.name: diff-so-fancy
blueprint.title: diff-so-fancy
